name: Agricultural Simulator 2011: Extended Edition
description: Assume the role of a farmer to make and manage your land. Invest in CLAAS machinery, crops, livestock, and other improvements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Intel or AMD  2.0 GHz with SSE2 support or better Memory: 1 GB Hard Disk Space: 750 MB Video Card: Geforce® ATI Radeon® 256 MB or better DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or higher Sound: DirectX compatible Additional: Internet connection required for multiplayer

reviews.review_text: The game runs ok I have this and the 2012 version i would recomend the 2012 version as it has more in it.   BEAWARE this game can be unstable I have not had instubility on these UiG titles but just be aware of this before you purchise these game the can be unstable to the point of not being useable.
I love to nuder animals, gives me that adrenaline rush that i crave. Wooops wrong game.

This game is so ♥♥♥♥ed up that it's unplayable, the guides dont work, there's no tutorial, and it barely gave ame a testicular tumor, just played 10 mins of it and i', done, Help in game neither works, please don't buy it untill it gets fixed.

Game is terrible. No tutorials or anything to explain what to do and the people don't even appear in multiplayer. Also poorly optimized and lacking in any depth. DO NOT even waste your time thinking about this game. -3/10
its a real good game but when i shut down my computer the game acts up
Good game. Graphics are pretty good along with the physics.

this is the worst game i think i've ever played in terms of enjoyment it has so many bugs i can't open it on my new computer  it has some good qualities but don't spend 2 dollars on it let alone the 20 i spent when i bought it
the only thing this game is good for is prentending to look cool on the internet. except you wont look cool on the internet. you wont look cool at all. dont buy this game.
So good it'll have you wanting your own farm!
